text: $MSFT view @ https://elliottwave-forecast.com/amember/go.php?r=17342&i=l1 As long as the 1/25 low remains intact, the instrument remains in the sideways zone.  We don’t like to trade the sideways area, only like to trade the extreme areas in 3, 7 or 11 swing. With markets at upper level of this support as well $AMD , $MSFT, $NVDA and many others have positioned as well at their upper level of support positioning with the major indexes to as well set into an uptrend momentum if the current momentum holds.  With market resting at upper support they are positioned to either cool off some and pull back to mid range of support and then gradually return to upper support with potential in and out of green waves with continued momentum of short covering and positioning taking place. Though markets have been moving in wide spreads of several hundred or more point moves up and down and in strong move many stocks as well have shadowed with healthy price range spreads offer great trade potential. But at top or bottom range these spread ranges get tight and unpredictable.  Just have to wait to see what the markets will do into the US open and roll with it.

⏳📈💰 TIME. GROWTH. MONEY
🎯 I.S.T. WATCHLIST FOR MAR 21st 2022 (MONDAY)

PART - 4

👉 $NVDA : Nvidia stock is the outlier here, nowhere close to an official buy point and lacking even a consolidation. Shares erased Monday's losses to run up 19.7% last week to 264.53, reclaiming its 200-day and 50-day lines. Retaking the 50-day line coincided with breaking a trendline, offering an aggressive entry.

👉 $MSFT : Microsoft stock jumped 7.3% last week, while Google climbed 4.8%. Both have similar charts, retaking their 50-day lines on Friday. If they can retake their 200-day lines, that would offer an early entry for position traders or a chance to buy them as Long-Term Leaders. Both have work to do to reclaim all-time highs.
